education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

project_experience.title: COMP 135: Machine Learning Coursework Projects
details: Applied feature engineering to transform raw data into more informative representations, improving classification accuracy on complex datasets.
Built and evaluated neural network models with different solvers and activation functions, analyzing tradeoffs in convergence and performance.

project_experience.title: JumboHack
details: Led the software development for a braille printing robot, collaborating with another Computer Science student to create a codebase that converted PDFs and text files into Arduino motor instructions.
Worked closely with a team of Mechanical Engineers, taking initiative to research and implement motor and Arduino wiring using documentation and online resources.
Contributed to a winning project in the 'Mad Hatter' track, competing against 325 participants in an open-category challenge.

work_experience.title: Human Robot Interaction Researcher
details: Developed navigation system using ROS to manage local and global goals through a vector-based approach.
Managed individual time effectively to contribute maximum value to projects.

work_experience.title: Web Programming Teaching Assistant
details: Provided technical guidance and feedback to ~20 students, fostering growth in web programming skills.

work_experience.title: Campus Center Manager
details: Ensured smooth operations and building security as the sole authority during shifts, demonstrating reliability and accountability.
Independently managed room access, opening and closing spaces per student and event needs.
Assisted students and campus groups with information and problem resolution, fostering a supportive campus environment.
